properties.name: base.domain
properties.description: Base domain for the service. Can be overridden via BASE_DOMAIN environment variable.

properties.name: auth.base-path
properties.description: Base path for auth endpoints (must remain /auth to match gateway).

properties.name: intent.trusted-signer
properties.description: Trusted signer address for intent validation.

properties.name: intent.reconciliation-interval-ms
properties.description: Interval for intent reconciliation in milliseconds.

properties.name: intent.execution-interval-ms
properties.description: Interval for intent execution in milliseconds.

properties.name: webauthn.credentials.table
properties.description: Database table name for WebAuthn credentials.

properties.name: webauthn.rp.id
properties.description: WebAuthn Relying Party ID. Must match the domain users see in browser.

properties.name: webauthn.rp.origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for WebAuthn attestation.

properties.name: webauthn.session.ttl.seconds
properties.description: WebAuthn onboarding session TTL in seconds.

properties.name: webauthn.session.cleanup.interval.seconds
properties.description: Interval for purging expired WebAuthn sessions in seconds.

properties.name: webauthn.attestation.conveyance
properties.description: Attestation conveyance preference: none, indirect, or direct.

properties.name: webauthn.authenticator.attachment
properties.description: Authenticator attachment preference: platform, cross-platform, or empty.

properties.name: webauthn.resident-key
properties.description: Resident key preference: required, preferred, or discouraged.

properties.name: webauthn.user-verification
properties.description: User verification preference: required, preferred, or discouraged.

properties.name: organization.invite.hmac-secret
properties.description: HMAC secret for organization invite links.

properties.name: marketplace.public-key-url
properties.description: URL where the marketplace exposes its public key for JWT validation.

properties.name: marketplace.key.cache-ms
properties.description: Cache duration for marketplace public key in milliseconds.

properties.name: contract.address
properties.description: Diamond contract address on the blockchain.

properties.name: institutional.wallet.address
properties.description: Institutional wallet address for automated transactions.

properties.name: institutional.wallet.password
properties.description: Password for decrypting institutional wallet key.

properties.name: saml.idp.trust-mode
properties.description: Trust mode for IdPs: whitelist or any.

properties.name: saml.trusted.idp
properties.description: Trusted IdP issuers JSON map (only used if trust-mode=whitelist).

properties.name: private.key.path
properties.description: Path to private key PEM file for JWT signing.

properties.name: public.key.path
properties.description: Path to public key PEM file for JWT verification.

properties.name: admin.dashboard.local-only
properties.description: Restrict admin dashboard to local connections only.

properties.name: admin.dashboard.allow-private
properties.description: Allow admin dashboard access from private networks.

properties.name: allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins.

properties.name: wallet.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins for wallet endpoints.

properties.name: ethereum.mainnet.rpc.url
properties.description: Ethereum Mainnet RPC URL(s), comma-separated for fallback.

properties.name: ethereum.sepolia.rpc.url
properties.description: Ethereum Sepolia RPC URL(s), comma-separated for fallback.

properties.name: wallet.max.transactions.per.hour
properties.description: Maximum transactions per hour for wallet security.

properties.name: wallet.max.balance.checks.per.minute
properties.description: Maximum balance checks per minute for wallet security.

properties.name: wallet.persistence.enabled
properties.description: Enable persistent storage of encrypted wallets.

properties.name: wallet.config.encryption-key
properties.description: Encryption key for wallet password in wallet-config.properties.

properties.name: wallet.config.encryption-key-file
properties.description: Path where the auto-generated encryption key is stored.

properties.name: ethereum.gas.limit.default
properties.description: Default gas limit for simple transactions.

properties.name: ethereum.gas.limit.contract
properties.description: Default gas limit for contract interactions.

properties.name: contract.events.to.listen
properties.description: Comma-separated list of contract events to listen for.

properties.name: contract.event.polling.enabled
properties.description: Enable polling fallback for unreliable RPC nodes.

properties.name: notifications.mail.driver
properties.description: Mail driver: noop, smtp, or graph.

properties.name: rpc.url
properties.description: RPC URL for blockchain connection (used in tests).

properties.name: institutional.wallet.private.key
properties.description: Private key for institutional wallet (used in tests only, use encrypted keys in production).

properties.name: institutional.admin.wallet
properties.description: Admin wallet address for institutional operations.

properties.name: saml.idp.certificate.path
properties.description: Path to SAML IdP certificate PEM file.
